newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay updated with events, programs, and community news

content: e'Bosch is a future heritage project
Working together so that Stellenbosch has a heritage where it is welcoming, safe, and everybody is thriving.
We achieve the future heritage by getting to know each other, appreciate each other and respect each other.
Finally, we weave a trust fabric in which all the problems in society can be solved at a minimum cost.

newsletter.title: Teken In Vir Ons Nuusbrief
newsletter.description: Bly op hoogte met geleenthede, programme en gemeenskapnieuws

content: Saam werk sodat Stellenbosch 'n erfenis het waar dit welkom, veilig is, en almal floreer.
Ons bereik die toekomstige erfenis deur mekaar te leer ken, mekaar te waardeer en mekaar te respekteer.
Laastens weef ons 'n vertroueweefsel waarin al die probleme in die samelewing teen minimale koste opgelos kan word.

newsletter.title: Yibhalisa ku-Newsletter
newsletter.description: Hlala ufumaniswe ngobusuku, iiprogramu kunye neendaba zoluntu

content: Kusebenza ngokudibanisa ukuze iStellenbosh ibe nenkcubeko apho ikhululekile, ilungile, kwaye wonke umntu ukulungele.
Siyayiphumeza ifutyela yenkcubeko ngokwazi enye enye, ukuhlonipha enye enye nokukhulelwa kwenye enye.
Okokugqibela, siyayibheka iqabane lokuthembana apho zonke iingxaki kwi-society zinokusulungwa ngamaxabiso amancinci.
